description: This file is a server entry point for a Remix application, handling HTTP requests and rendering server-side components with streaming support. It includes request handling for bots and browsers, setting CORS headers, and rendering React components server-side.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main request handler distinguishing between bot and browser requests, setting CORS headers, and responding with server-rendered content.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for bot user agents, streaming the response.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for browsers, streaming the response.
